subject: RE: [junit] JUnit/HTTPUnit w/JavaScript
messageBody:
Andrew wrote:
> I believe the website has been moved to:
> http://developer.berlios.de/projects/jsunit/
>
> andrew f

Thanks, you're right :)


> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Schaible, Jörg" <joerg.schaible@...>
> To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, May 14, 2003 7:55 AM
> Subject: RE: [junit] JUnit/HTTPUnit w/JavaScript
>
>
> Dale wrote:
>> I'm looking to test my app and would like to use both of these
>> (JUnit / HTTPUnit with JavaScript) Does anyone have any good
>> examples of code that I can use. It seems all of the links that
>> people give me never really shows me any example code.
>
> Hi Dale,
>
> for JavaScript you have the choice between two implementations:
> jsUnit from Edward Hieatt available at
> http://sf.net/projects/jsunit or
> JsUnit from me available at http://www.berlios.de/projects/jsunit
>
> Edward's version is completly browser based and might fit better if
> you want to test code based on actions in the DOM model, while my
> version is more strictly a JUnit port concentrating on funcionality.
> Look to the project's homepages and delivery for examples.
>
> Regards,
> Jörg
>
>
